summary: Occasionally the actions of Vox Machina are so horrific(ly stupid) they give me anxiety/secondhand embarassment and I need to...
body: Occasionally the actions of Vox Machina are so horrific(ly stupid) they give me anxiety/secondhand embarassment and I need to pause for an indefinite period. I am currently working up the courage to watch fly-Scanlan obviously be un-polymorphed as soon as he tries to sneak into the throne room.

summary: Caleb "coward" Widogast: actively throws himself into precarious situations--occasionally without assuring he has back up--and...
body: Caleb “coward” Widogast: actively throws himself into precarious situations–occasionally without assuring he has back up–and uses skills that are likely very triggering to him in order to learn as much as he can about an enemy to save the friends he can’t quite admit he loves yet

reblog.comment: Caleb “coward” Widogast: actively throws himself into precarious situations–occasionally without assuring he has back up–and uses skills that are likely very triggering to him in order to learn as much as he can about an enemy to save the friends he can’t quite admit he loves yet

summary:
pandaikon0980
 replied to your post  “lesbiansavingthrow:
 I’m honestly so excited that caduceus is a grave...”
                ...
body:
pandaikon0980 replied to your post “lesbiansavingthrow: I’m honestly so excited that caduceus is a grave…”
Especially since Caduceus’ WIS is 20. That’s gonna be 5 negated crits per long rest. Matt’s gonna be loosing it and Taliesin’s gonna be do damned smug. I consider it karma for using the Golden Snitch against it’s true master.

Ohhhhhh my god that’s such a good point!

This is gonna be wild I love it.

My DM is always this mixture of delighted/frustrated when I use that ability. He gets all excited for a big damage roll or some wild effect and I’m like “… nope” and the team cheers. It’s a fun ability to utilize when fights get real nasty.

blog.name: callipigio
blog.title: callipigio
blog.description:
Hya!
Luna here, 30, she/her, Italian Londoner, too many fandoms (and the occasional baking!), don't expect much coherence here, this is me screaming into the void about the things i like... On a more serious note, I rarely tag things, mainly because don't even think about doing it, so if you need them, think about it, or unfollow, I definitely understand. Also I'm a feminist and an atheist, just FYI. 
;)

tags: taliesin owns my entire ass anyways
but i feel like i never loved a character more than i love my molly
like you'd miss an old friend
summary: I LOVE Caduceus, he’s a beautiful calming presence, he’s pink, he’s funny, he’s like this weird amalgama of The Dude, the dwarf...
body:
I LOVE Caduceus, he’s a beautiful calming presence, he’s pink, he’s funny, he’s like this weird amalgama of The Dude, the dwarf gardener of the Unseen University of the Discworld with a pastel goth twist, with the looks of Doug Jones and young Tom Waits and the voice of a stoned Sam Elliott. I ADORE him.
But.

Can we have him for a while, like Taryon and then get our beautiful son of Chaos and Rainbow back? I still can’t accept all the lost potential than Molly’s death left us with. I need my moon child back.

But I’d love to keep Mr Clay for a while…

I ADORE him.

But I’d love to keep Mr Clay for a while…
